results.name: First column of A174295.
comment: First 6 terms as in Mobius function A008683. Signed version of A099323 with an additional leading 1.
formula: a(n) = -(-3)^(n-3/2)*hypergeom([3/2, n-1],[2],4) for n > 2 (guessed formula) [From _Mark van Hoeij_, Jul 02 2010]
results.author: _Mats Granvik_, Mar 15 2010
